about_the_game:
Hellstorm: Reign is a first-person shooter game that combines the fast-paced action of classic and modern FPS games.

In a world devastated by endless wars and ecological disasters, humanity is on the brink of extinction. The surface of the planet has turned into a barren wasteland known as Hellstorm, while underneath lies a hidden sanctuary called Itopia. Itopia promises peace and advanced technology.

As a special agent, you must infiltrate Hellstorm and uncover the secrets of Itopia. Utilize advanced movement abilities like wall-running, sliding, and quick maneuvers to navigate dangerous environments and evade enemy attacks. Your arsenal is filled with powerful weapons, each offering different variations to suit your playstyle.

Hellstorm: Reign offers a fast-paced and tactical gameplay experience. Defeat deadly enemies, solve environmental puzzles, and discover the truth behind Itopia's perfect facade. Explore the detailed environments of both the high-tech Itopia and the ruins of the surface, and uncover hidden secrets in the struggle for survival.

           

Key Features:

  • Story-Driven Gameplay: Explore a complex narrative filled with moral dilemmas, unexpected twists, and deep character development.

  • Advanced Combat Mechanics: Experience highly responsive gunplay paired with realistic animations and weapon handling.

  • Varied Environments: Traverse detailed and immersive settings, from desolate urban landscapes to fortified enemy strongholds.

  • Customization and Progression: Tailor your loadout and abilities to match your playstyle as you progress through a richly detailed campaign.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Hellstorm: Reign is a story-driven first-person shooter game where you play as an advanced soldier from Itopia. In the game, you infiltrate the dystopian wasteland and complete missions assigned to you, all while uncovering the hidden secrets of Itopia.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, German, Arabic, Turkish*, French, Japanese, Azerbaijani
*languages with full audio support
